extendedInfo.description: This version is no longer open to purchase, to buy the PRO please refer to. https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.beansoft.eyespyFor users who have purchased this app. You can unlock the pro features by: 1. Keep this app installed. 2. Download the lite from:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.beansoft.eyespy.free3. Open up the lite and you will see all the pro features unlocked. Thanks. If you have any questions, feel free to contact me: elnoxvie@gmail.comSmartStay Ex is an easy to use and free app that implements one of the coolest features in Samsung Galaxy S3, the Smart Stay. The feature uses the front facing camera to detect whether the user is looking at the phone and if the user is, then Smart Stay makes sure the phone screen stays on so the user can continue to read or do whatever they were doing. If not, itâll shut the screen off. It thus more accurately controls the screen based on how the user is using it and you can get rid of the annoying action of having to turn on the screen or touch the screen so that your screen stays on.Features: * Double checking - preventing screen off from accidental fail detection with double checking feature.  * Idle time feature - allows app to intelligently run the scanning when the device is idle. * [PRO]Low Light support - Help the app to function properly under low light environment. * [PRO]Exception List - This allows you to specify which app you don't want the app to run on. * Debug Mode - Allows you to easily see what went wrong with  the detection. * Customizable Polling Time - Enable you to specify the time out customization (based on your display time out) * Premium Support. ****** PLEASE TRY THE LITE TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS BEFORE BUYING THE PRO VERSION ******Thanks. Please don't comment on google play, we are unable to provide a guide or solution here. Send an email to me, i will respond ASAP. Thanks. Keywords: Iseeyou, smart stay, Samsung.

reviews.title: Idle time feature?
reviews.comment: What happened to this feature? Not seeing it in accessibility settings.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok that was quick service.
reviews.comment: Complained of constant crash on start and three hours later it was fixed. Impressed. Still doesnt work on my device but good response time fixing issues.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Former beta tester\'s take
reviews.comment: I use this version, and also recommend this (eventhough it says don\'t buy), the green smart stay is garbage. it\'s more expensive and doesn\'t work well. I made a titanium backup of the app, I hope I can keep using this working version for a long time. I have paid for this program and I am really irritated by the merger with an obviously inferior product.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: This is a great application. Works really well on my xoom in nearly all lighting conditions.  It is a real shame you are not continuing work on THIS version as the the OTHER version DOES NOT WORK AT ALL, even after all the other developers updates, I see zero improvement. You should never have merged. Bring back THIS version I say.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What a shame!
reviews.comment: I had lot of expectations when I purchased this app. As soon they merged with the other dev, none of the apps work anymore.  The app keeps crashing. It doesn\'t work consistently .  My first paid app that is a total waste of money.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Works really well
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: FIXED!!!!! >Broken!
reviews.comment: Thanks for fixing! 1.04 Now working with my sgs2 and my n7, please support this going forward with your \'merger\'. Please Don\'t forget your users that bought your app before your merge.....previous problem >>>After install it directs you to the \'new\' version, can\'t install says not compatible with my device, please fix or refund<<<< FIXED!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Back again
reviews.comment: Hope you guys get the merge smoothed out.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No way.
reviews.comment: Screeble is so much better.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hmm
reviews.comment: Worked great on Droid Razr, but having trouble detecting face after update.  Tried video vs snap shot only to no avail
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stopped working after merge
reviews.comment: Was a great app now no use
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nexus 7
reviews.comment: Don\'t uninstall the old version on nexus 7. New version not compatible with device and now I can\'t reinstall old version. Please fix. Works good on my GS2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Broken
reviews.comment: Worked amazing before, now broken and not working with the nexus 7. Refund please
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs fix for Nexus 7
reviews.comment: The update is not compatible with the Nexus 7.  Needs fix please or refund.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Back again
reviews.comment: Brought back but won\'t work fcs all the time come on dev this was really good now useless!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works
reviews.comment: New version works in galaxy nexus just fine, no issues.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works flawless on GS2!
reviews.comment: One of the features that I want from is GS3 is now in my GS2. Thank you! Hoping for more features, updates, bug fixes and more supported devices.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Beta tester
reviews.comment: App works great. I\'m really glad developer lisent our suggestions. Will recommend.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Works well on my One X. This was one of the features of the SIII that I liked when deciding which phone to get.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: hit or miss
reviews.comment: this is an app that would be very useful to me.  with idle time and low light support on, its hit or miss, which isnt good enoug.  I\'m not sure if I\'m holding it at the wrong angle or something.  will keep around to see if updates help
reviews.author: A Google User
